source_caption_data.pre_caption: A medium shot frames a man in the left foreground, with a paved path in the middle ground and a forest in the background. The man swings a tennis racket from the left toward the center of the frame. A red bell pepper appears in the center foreground, positioned on the racket. As the racket continues its swing across the frame to the right, the pepper explodes in the center foreground, sending a cloud of red fragments scattering primarily toward the left and bottom of the frame. The camera is positioned at the subject's level.
